info.description: OpenUSP API Gateway provides RESTful APIs for managing TR-369 USP and TR-069 CWMP devices
info.title: OpenUSP API Gateway

get.description: Get a list of all alerts in the system
Get a list of all registered devices

post.description: Register a new device in the system

get.description: Get detailed information about a specific device

delete.description: Remove a device from the system

get.description: Get all alerts for a specific device

post.description: Execute a command on a device

get.description: Retrieve the complete data model for a device
Retrieve all objects for a device
Retrieve a specific object by its path
Retrieve all parameters for a device

post.description: Get multiple device parameters at once

get.description: Search for device parameters by path

post.description: Set multiple device parameters at once

get.description: Retrieve the schema for a device
Get all sessions for a specific device
Get all subscriptions for a device

post.description: Create a new subscription for device events

get.description: Retrieve the object tree structure for a device
Get a list of all sessions
Get detailed information about a specific session
Check if the API Gateway service is healthy
Get detailed status information about the API Gateway
